description: Decimal encoding of the prime factorization of n: for n > 0 with prime factorization Product_{i=1..k} prime(i)^e_i, let E_n = (e_k, ..., e_1), replace each nonzero e_i with A052382(e_i) and each zero e_i with "" in E_n to obtain F_n, concatenate the elements of F_n with a "0" inserted after every element except for the last, and interpret in decimal base.
